intro: Vibexia sericea, commonly known as silky vibexia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features finely haired stems and leaves, giving it a silky appearance. It produces small, daisy-like flowers that are typically yellow or white in color. Vibexia sericea is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream banks.
